page.title: 06RECREATION IN BROMYARD
page.content: Since 1979 the{Conquest Theatre {Company}has put on four productions a year in their 100 seat theatre. {Bromyard Cricket Club}at{Flaggoners {Green}now runs three sides, all in the {Herefordshire League.}In recent years the club has played{Worcestershire}and {Warwickshire}in special games. Other clubs include{tennis}and {badminton}at the Queen Elizabeth High School. Near St.Peter's Church there is a{bowls club. The{Rifle Club}meet every Tuesday at Broad Bridge. The 16 members each pay an annual membership fee of Â£20. The club participates in County Championship and postal matches. {Bromyard Football Club}has 2 adult sides and 3 junior teams. They play at Broad Bridge and train at the High School. In 1985 they made their first overseas tour to France.
